sn35.111:1.1: “Monks, without directly knowing and completely understanding the seer, without dispassion for it and giving it up, you can’t end suffering.
sn35.111:1.2: Without directly knowing and completely understanding the hearer …
sn35.111:1.6: thinker, without dispassion for it and giving it up, you can’t end suffering.
sn35.111:1.7: By directly knowing and completely understanding the seer, having dispassion for it and giving it up, you can end suffering.
sn35.111:1.8: By directly knowing and completely understanding the hearer … smeller … taster …
sn35.111:1.10: thinker, having dispassion for it and giving it up, you can end suffering.”
